ResearchProjectDef.label: Goa'uld tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock foundational Goa'uld tech, including interface protocols, energy matrices, and that smug sense of superiority you've been missing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Jaffa armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Gain access to traditional Jaffa armor—ceremonial, intimidating, and surprisingly effective at deflecting bullets and compliments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Guard armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock specialized armor worn by elite Jaffa guards and First Primes. Offers increased protection and 200% more self-importance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Kull armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Crack the secrets of Kull supersoldier plating: a naquadah-infused, self-stiffening composite that treats small arms like weather. Learn to fabricate the overlapping plates and the power harness that drives them. Heavy, hungry, and hilariously overkill—just how the Goa’uld like their fashion.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Kull armor
subject_story->salvaged overlapping plates and found a phase-tuned composite woven with naquadah microfilaments
subject_story->observed self-sealing behavior under stress and logged rapid microfracture recovery
subject_story->reverse-engineered the power harness that stiffens the suit and feeds the ablative layers
subject_story->ran live-fire trials; bullets complained, lasers sulked, testers requested lighter lunch
subject_gerund->fabricating naquadah-infused Kull composite plating and power harnesses

ResearchProjectDef.label: Kara kesh
ResearchProjectDef.description: Gain insight into how to construct your own Kara kesh, the Goa'uld multifunctional apparatus also known as a hand or ribbon device.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Kara kesh device
subject_story->salvaged a shattered Kara kesh from the ruins of a Goa'uld outpost
subject_story->witnessed a Goa’uld commander disintegrate a foe with a mere gesture
subject_story->analyzed the residual naquadah energy signature embedded in the control crystals
subject_story->decoded a partial system log referencing "Pain Induction Mode"
subject_gerund->reverse-engineering a Kara kesh

ResearchProjectDef.label: Jaffa weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Gain access to traditional Jaffa armaments, including staff weapons and Zat guns. Loud, flashy, and excellent at vaporizing subtlety.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Kull weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Reverse-engineer the devastating weaponry of the Kull supersoldiers. Because if you can't stop them, you might as well outgun them.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Kull armor
subject_story->recovered a scorched Kull cannon from a fallen supersoldier and stripped the emitter assembly
subject_story->mapped the plasma confinement field and noted catastrophic heat bleed into non-Goa’uld housings
subject_story->identified a naquadah-doped capacitor bank cycling at inhuman discharge rates
subject_story->replaced the control crystal array with a safer Tau’ri trigger interface (safer, not safe)
subject_gerund->adapting Kull plasma drivers for field manufacture

ResearchProjectDef.label: Staff Cannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Scale up staff-weapon physics into a manned emplacement. Unlocks the Goa’uld staff cannon—because sometimes diplomacy needs a sun-hot punctuation mark.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AI defense
ResearchProjectDef.description: Goa’uld weaponsmiths, obsessed with efficiency and intimidation, have finally managed to bind staff cannon plasma tech to scavenged ion-focusing arrays. The result is a terrifying marriage of ancient cruelty and stolen science: automated staff cannons that no longer need Jaffa to man them. They fire ceaselessly, with inhuman precision, until their barrels melt or their cores detonate. Unlocks construction of automated staff cannon turrets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Symbiote basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Delve deeper into the biology of Goa'uld symbiotes to decode how they bond, heal, and dominate their hosts. Learn how to “safely” extract one—or install it with only moderate screaming. The line between cure and conquest has never been thinner.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Recovered field notes describe the Goa'uld as both parasite and miracle cure—capable of healing mortal wounds while rewriting the host from the inside out. Your researchers are confident they can replicate this relationship without the “enslavement” part. Probably.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Goa'uld symbiote
subject_adj->larval
subject_adj->neuroparasitic
subject_adj->biochemically elegant
subject_story->mapped the neural lattice where the symbiote interfaces with the host’s spinal column
subject_story->isolated regenerative enzymes responsible for accelerated tissue recovery
subject_story->recorded electrical interference patterns that mirror higher cognitive suppression
subject_story->observed a dormant larva reactivating when exposed to host adrenaline
subject_story->accidentally triggered a telepathic feedback loop; one intern now insists they are a minor god
subject_gerund->charting symbiote-host integration sequences
subject_gerund->replicating regenerative compounds under sterile conditions
subject_gerund->testing neural harmonization thresholds

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hover skid
ResearchProjectDef.description: Reverse-engineer a gravitic cargo skid with Naquadah focusing rails. It floats wherever the handler steps, turning backbreaking salvage runs into a glide. Handle with care—if the field collapses under load, everything goes up in a very educational flash.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tel'tak
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the Tel'tak—a stealth-capable transport ship ideal for reconnaissance, smuggling, or dramatic escape sequences. Fast, quiet, and very Goa'uld about it.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Recovered system notes paint a familiar Goa'uld picture: elegant shortcuts, theatrical security, and a ship that lives to slip past attention. With enough Naquadah and a little humility, we can reproduce the courier platform—minus the ego of a System Lord.\n\nPractical upshot: stealth plating, VTOL agility, and a hold sized for questionable cargo.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Goa'uld Tel'tak
subject->courier craft
subject->smuggler’s shuttle
subject_adj->stealth-tuned
subject_adj->heat-masked
subject_adj->Naquadah-fed
subject_adj->blockade-runner
subject_story->an engine note that fades under sensor thresholds
subject_story->polished control studs built for dramatic hand gestures
subject_story->cargo clamps balanced for “don’t ask” payloads
subject_gerund->mapping shield harmonics against colony-grade parts
subject_gerund->calibrating inertial dampers for dirt-strip landings
subject_gerund->spoofing low-grade scans with staged heat blooms

ResearchProjectDef.label: Sarcophagus
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Gain access to the Goa’uld sarcophagus: a relic that knits flesh, purges disease, and drags the dying back across the line.

It also erodes judgment, inflates ego, and whispers that maybe you deserve to live forever.

Miracle on the outside, rot on the inside—just like the Goa’uld who used it.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Your team has reconstructed the operating cycle of a Goa’uld sarcophagus. It heals aggressively, mends what should stay broken, and tempts the user to try “just one more session.”\n\nIt will save lives—and change people. Handle it like a loaded ideology.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Goa'uld Sarcophagus
subject->resurrection cradle
subject->healing reliquary
subject_adj->Ancient-derived
subject_adj->addictive
subject_adj->morally compromising
subject_adj->bio-restorative
subject_story->a coffin that returns the living and buries the self
subject_story->a machine that mistakes wholeness for goodness
subject_story->a light that heals the body and hollows the soul
subject_gerund->mapping sarcophagus pulse envelopes against living tissue
subject_gerund->tuning Naquadah carriers to stabilize regenerative cascades
subject_gerund->adding interlocks the Goa’uld never bothered with

ResearchProjectDef.label: sarcophagus regeneration
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Extend the Goa’uld sarcophagus’ already reckless healing into full tissue regrowth.

By cross-referencing Glitterworld bioregeneration with naquadah-accelerated pulse envelopes, your team can coax the sarcophagus into rebuilding missing flesh instead of just stabilizing what’s left.

Fingers and toes are just the beginning. The line between “revived” and “reassembled” gets blurry fast.

rulesStrings.li: subject->sarcophagus bioregeneration
subject->naquadah-guided tissue regrowth
subject->cellular cascade reassembly
subject_adj->dangerously precise
subject_adj->Glitterworld-adjacent
subject_adj->ethically dubious
subject_story->a Goa'uld tool that no Glitterworld ethics board would approve
subject_story->a cycle that mistakes continuity of flesh for continuity of self
subject_story->an upgrade that makes “should we?” a more important question than “can we?”
subject_gerund->mapping biosculpter regrowth envelopes onto sarcophagus waveforms
subject_gerund->tuning naquadah carriers to rebuild missing structures
subject_gerund->teaching Ancient-derived hardware new, very illegal tricks

ResearchProjectDef.label: sarcophagus calibration
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Integrate the knowledge gained from studying ZPMs directly into the sarcophagus pulse envelope.

By reshaping its carrier fields instead of brute-forcing raw wattage, your engineers can reconfigure the sarcophagus to sip power from the grid instead of ripping it out in great chunks.

It still hums like a minor god. It just does so about a third more efficiently.

rulesStrings.li: subject->sarcophagus subspace optimization
subject->ZPM-cushioned sarcophagus cycling
subject->carrier-field power shaping
subject_adj->ZPM-assisted
subject_adj->phase-stabilized
subject_adj->whisper-quiet and terrifying
subject_story->a Goa'uld coffin that finally learned to stop screaming at the grid
subject_story->a healing device that rides ZPM harmonics instead of brute wattage
subject_story->a pulse pattern that sounds like a hymn and meters like a scalpel
subject_gerund->shaping subspace envelopes to reduce peak draw
subject_gerund->phase-locking sarcophagus cycles to ZPM carrier noise
subject_gerund->teaching the machine to glide along the vacuum instead of punching it
